name: Living Armor
desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

name: Wall of Replica
desc: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Death Pact
desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

name: Time Lock
desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

name: Thundergod's Wrath
desc: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

name: Impetus
desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Mana Shield
desc: Creates a shield that absorbs 60% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

name: Drunken Haze
desc: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

name: Take Aim
desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

name: Incapacitating Bite
desc: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
